data.text:
@JonFlan March is the month for Et Tu Brute. 
Show them whose stocks Marjorie Greene has: the anti-Vax queen has Pfizer & more. 

The convoy of billionaire PACs & political stardom will learn how vanity consumes itself. Just needs a little motivation to start it. 
https://t.co/C9OKYNpo05 https://t.co/xNFHBaKKWh
@JonFlan Nearly a million people dead from COVID...this is partial the reason.

@JonFlan I'm still trying to wrap my head around the desire to stay clear of any of the free Covid-19 life-saving vaccines for various unfounded reasons that leave the taxpayers funding time and meds in hospital, in some cases many, many months of round the clock extended care.
@17frosted @JonFlan Impounding trucks.  Better of the choices, IMO.

@JonFlan I think freedom from a potentially fatal illness and the freedom to live a longer healthy life are more valuable than refusing to temporarily wear a mask in public places. Anytime Fauci or anyone from the NIAID, the NIH or the CDC want a break from saving us the drinks are on me.
@17frosted @JonFlan I heard Cola is better. Just sayinâ€™. https://t.co/3ry87uP2mr
